name: Domino Effect
description: Pick up an entire building and use it as a weapon. Go supernova and send everything flying in an outward direction. Use gravity in a way that has never been used before.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 (64-bit) Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon 3750 Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Basically any modern desktop. It's more CPU intensive than GPU.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10, 8, 7 (64-bit) Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon 4850 Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Basically any modern desktop. It's more CPU intensive than GPU.
